title: Soft Hands
description: Charlie is a big league ballplayer and a chick magnet to boot. During the season he has no shortage of pretty women throwing themselves at him.But the off season's different, and at a family Christmas party he meets one of his friend's sisters, who seems like maybe she could be something more than just a good lay...So what's a man supposed to do when the woman of his dreams says "You're exactly the kind of beef-eating Texas boy I like to fuck all night long. But don't you dare fall in love with me, you hear?"
author: Cecilia Tan
